Literature.Title: Designing a leucine-rich antibacterial nonapeptide with potent activity against mupirocin-resistant MRSA via a structure-activity relationship study.
Literature.Author: Ang QA, Arfan G, Ong CYF, Ng FM, Ong EHQ, Chia CSB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MBC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1708(MIC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1750(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 500(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 600(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-2762(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700698(MIC=3.13µM)
